Typewriting  Shorthand    UTME  subjects  Mathematics,  Economics,  
Principles of Account.  
iv. OSUNPOLY requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and 
any two (2) of Commerce, Business Method, Book 
keeping, Accounts, Geography, Information 
Technology, Office Practice and one (1) Science 
subject. Accepts ICT/Data Processing/Computer 
Studies, Office Practice, Financial 
Accounting/Book Keeping, Civic  
Education/Government/History, and Business 
Methods/Business Management/Commerce/  
Marketing.  
v. LASPOTEC does not accept Literature in English 
as course requirement for Business studies.  
vi. DELPOLY accepts Agricultural Science and  
Literature in English.  
vii. RAMATPOLY accepts Certificate in Accountancy 
from a recognised Institution plus necessary ‘O’ 
level requirements  
viii. OTEFE does not accept History.  
ix. KWAPOLY offers it as Business Studies. Does not 
accept History but accepts Statistics and  
Secretarial Duties.  
x. FEDPO-EDE requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes or its equivalent in English Language, 
Mathematics, Economics/Commerce, and any 
other two (2) subjects from the following Business  
 Methods/Business  Studies,  
Physics/Chemistry/Biology/Agricultural science, 
Animal Husbandry, Principle of Account/Book- 
 keeping,  Government/History,  Civic  
Education/Social Studies, Geography, Marketing. 
xi. FEDPO -NEK accepts as one (1) of the three (3) 
other subjects Statistic, CRS, Information 
Communication Technology and any one (1) of Science 
subject.  
xii. CABSP accepts Certificate Course of the College 
or fr om any recognised institution OR any other 
qualification recognized by the College Academic 
Board.  
xiii. FEDPO-BAU requires Government in addition to 
Mathematics and Economics.
